title: Features of the new phone
answer:
HUAWEI Y625 are Android powered smart mobile phones developed by Huawei with the latest Android 4.4 Kitkat OS from Google™. All including in a slim touch phone: 

 • Latest Android 4.4 kitkat OS 

 • Qualcomm MSM8212, Quad core, 1.2 GHz, Cortex A7 CPU 

 • High speed HSDPA +/HSUPA network up to 42Mbps/5.76Mbps 

 • 8 MP Auto Focus rear camera with LED Flash+ 2MP Fix Focus front camera. Support Panorama, Audio note, Andio control, Water mark, Filter, Touch to capture, burst shoot etc. 

 • 5.0 inch FWVGA(854X480) IPS screen, full touch screen supporting 2 point multi-touch 

 • Y625-U13, Y625-U43 support UMTS: 850/1900/2100 MHz 

 Y625-U21, Y625-U32 support UMTS: 900/2100 MHz 

 All of them support GSM/GPRS/EDGE: 850/900/1800/1900 MHz 

 • WCDMA+GSM , 3FF size SIM card standard (Micro sim card) 

 Y625-U13, Y625-U21 has only one SIM Card slot, but Y625-U32, Y625-U43 support Dual-SIM Card slot and dual standby 

 • Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n, support Wi-Fi hotspot, Wi-Fi direct 

 • Bluetooth v4.0 

 • GPS/AGPS 

 • G-sensor for auto-rotate 

 • Proximity sensor for auto LCD backlight turn-off 

 • Ambient light sensor for auto LCD backlight adjusting 

 • 2000mAh Battery 

 • EMUI2.3 Lite 

 • Abundant Google applications(preinstalled according to google’s policy)
